name: console-server
description: This logging module was created to simplify logging by employing good features with no configuration needed.

scripts.coveralls: npm bin /istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R spec ./test/* && node node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js < coverage/lcov.info
